page.title: 04E.COVENTRY,MOTORWAY LINKS
page.content: This section contains important motorway links.There is a junction for the{M6-M69}which joins Coventry and the{M6}with Leicester and the {M1}.Access to Coventry from junction 2 (M6)is via the{A46}which also links Coventry with Leicester. Clearly this area contains{crucial {connections}between Coventry and other centres of population and industry. The possibility of a{container depot with entry to the motorways at junction 2 offers{commercial {potential},as well as arousing{local {concern. The presence of the motorways has led to the development of a{motorway {vehicle recovery firm}at Barnacle and Potters Green.
